title: Voyage Of Truth
description: Lieutenant Nuloâ€™s battle skills are legendary. Unfortunately, his showboating behavior has created enemies and he faces accusations which lead to formal charges. Determined to redeem himself, but relentlessly hunted by those who double-crossed him, he is running out of places to hide. Along the way he meets Grae, a shrewd hustler with selfish ambition and Dena a by-the-book commander, who unintentionally stumbles upon a widespread conspiracy. These three strangers will struggle to work together and soon learn their destinies are intertwined to save their world.
author: Dion Lack
